categories.name: Investment
categories.description: Tools for founders to calculate investment probability

criteria.description: Measures how promptly the investor responds to communications.
Evaluates the investor's expressed enthusiasm and proactive engagement.
Counts the number of meetings or calls held with the investor.

scoreDescriptors.2: One or two meetings or calls

criteria.description: Assesses whether the investor has introduced you to other potential investors or partners.
Evaluates the constructiveness and usefulness of the feedback provided.
Measures how well the investor understands and supports your startup's mission and goals.
Assesses the suitability of the investor's focus area, stage, and cheque size for your startup.
Evaluates the transparency and efficiency of the investor's decision-making process.
Measures your confidence in the investor's integrity and reliability.
Considers the investorâ€™s standing in the industry and among other founders.
Assesses the personal connection and chemistry with the investor.
Measures how quickly the investor moves from interest to commitment.
Evaluates the additional support provided, such as mentorship or industry contacts.
Assesses the investor's ability to meet your funding needs.
Measures the investor's background in investing in early-stage startups.
Evaluates how well the investor's interests align with your industry and objectives.
Assesses openness in communication regarding expectations and terms.
Measures the prestige and recognition of the VC firm in the industry.
Evaluates the involvement and interest level of senior partners.
Assesses the fairness and attractiveness of the proposed investment terms.
Measures the length of time the firm takes to make an investment decision.
Evaluates the potential for collaboration with other portfolio companies.
Assesses the firm's knowledge and experience in your startup's industry.
Measures the resources and support the firm offers after investment.
Considers how well the firm's culture aligns with your company values.
Evaluates the firm's connections with other investors for future funding rounds.
Measures how closely the corporation's goals align with your startup's objectives.
Assesses the opportunities for partnerships or integrations.
Evaluates any restrictions or controls the investor wants to impose.
Measures the corporation's standing and influence in your market.
Assesses potential conflicts that may arise from the investment.
Evaluates the complexity of the corporation's decision-making process.
Measures the safeguards in place to protect your proprietary information.
Assesses the likelihood that the corporation may aim to acquire your startup.
Evaluates the value provided in terms of mentorship, resources, and networking.
Measures the amount of equity the program requires for participation.
Assesses the track record of the program's graduates.
Evaluates how well your startup aligns with the focus of the cohort.
Considers the time commitment and workload required.
Measures the impact of the program's location on your operations.
Assesses the level of ongoing assistance after program completion.
Measures the credibility and popularity of the crowdfunding platform.
Assesses the likelihood of reaching your funding goal on the platform.
Evaluates the financial cost of using the platform.
Measures how well the platform's user base matches your target audience.
Assesses the availability of promotional and analytical tools.
Considers the regulatory requirements and protections.
Evaluates the level of interaction and support from the platform community.
Assesses how well your startup meets the criteria for the grant or fund.
Evaluates the effort required to complete the application process.
Measures the potential financial benefit.
Assesses any limitations or requirements tied to the funding.
Considers how quickly funds will be available.
Evaluates whether the funding affects ownership structure.
Measures the prestige associated with receiving the grant or fund.
Measures the level of trust and support from the individual.
Assesses their ability to provide the required funds without hardship.
Considers the potential effect on personal relationships.
Evaluates their expectation for involvement in the business.
Measures the leniency in repayment terms or expectations.
Assesses how openly terms and expectations are discussed.
Assesses how far you've progressed in the YC application process.
Evaluates the quality of interactions with YC partners or representatives.
Measures alignment with YC's areas of interest and investment patterns.
Assesses the usefulness of any feedback or advice provided.
Evaluates the influence of any referrals or recommendations you have.
Measures how actively you are engaging with the YC community.
Considers the timing of your application relative to YC's funding cycles.
Assesses any improvements since previous applications to YC.
Evaluates alignment with 500 Startups' regional programs.
Measures how well your startup fits with specific 500 Startups programs.
Assesses the level of interest shown by 500 Startups staff.
Evaluates the potential for valuable mentorship.
Measures the benefits of connecting with the alumni network.
Assesses how well your company culture aligns with 500 Startups.
Considers the likelihood of additional investment post-program.
Evaluates the constructiveness of any initial feedback received.
Measures the investor's commitment to a long-term partnership.
Assesses how the investor's strengths complement your weaknesses.
Evaluates the investor's ability to open new markets for your startup.
Measures the resources the investor is willing to provide beyond capital.
Assesses how the partnership affects your potential exit strategies.
Evaluates the investor's willingness to negotiate terms.
Measures alignment in company culture and values.
Assesses the thoroughness and reasonableness of their due diligence.
Measures how well your funding needs match the firm's investment ranges.
Assesses the level of control the firm wants over your company.
Evaluates the firm's expected timeframe for return on investment.
Measures how much the firm wants to be involved in day-to-day operations.
Assesses the firm's history of successful investments.
Evaluates the firm's expertise in your industry.
Considers potential synergies with other companies in their portfolio.
Assesses the complexity of the financial structures proposed.

categories.name: Health
categories.description: Assess your likelihood of encountering common health issues.

criteria.description: Measures how often you are in close contact with people who are unwell.
Frequency of washing or sanitising hands throughout the day.
Assess the regularity and quality of your sleep.
Evaluates the nutritional value and balance of your diet.
Frequency of engaging in physical activities or exercise.
Measures the average level of stress you experience in daily life.
Frequency of child attending school or daycare, where germs are easily spread.
How often does your child have playdates or interact with other children outside of school?
Measure of how up-to-date your child is with recommended vaccinations.
Assess the cleanliness standards of your home environment.
Evaluate the healthiness and balance of your child's diet.
Evaluates the strength and frequency of social interactions and connections.
Frequency of engaging in activities that promote mental well-being.
Measures your balance between work responsibilities and personal life.
Assesses the consistency and regularity of your sleep schedule.
Evaluates your strategies and effectiveness in managing stress.
Measures how easily you can access professional mental health support.
Frequency and regularity of physical activities tailored for ageing.
Measures the quality and balance of your diet.
Evaluates how often you engage in activities that challenge the mind.
Measures your ability to perform daily activities independently.
Assesses how often you visit healthcare professionals for check-ups and screenings.
Frequency of participation in community or social activities.

categories.name: Travel
categories.description: Assess your likelihood of having successful travel experiences.

criteria.description: Ensures you have received and confirmed your flight booking.
Measures how well you have packed and prepared your luggage.
Evaluates your time management skills to ensure timely arrival at the airport.
Ensures all necessary travel documents are prepared and valid.
Experience in navigating airport security smoothly.
Measures your preparedness for managing health-related issues while travelling.

scoreDescriptors.5: Fully prepared with all necessary precautions

criteria.description: Measures the validity and preparedness of your passport for international travel.
Ensures you have obtained the necessary visas for your destination.
Measures how comprehensively you have covered yourself with travel insurance.
Assesses your ability to communicate in the local language of your destination.
Evaluates your understanding and respect for the local customs and cultures.
Measures your readiness in terms of vaccinations and medications for travel.
Evaluates the condition and readiness of your vehicle for a long trip.
Assesses the thoroughness of planning your trip route, including stops and accommodations.
Measures your readiness with essentials like food, water, and emergency kits.
Assesses how well you've prepared entertainment options for the trip.
Evaluates the suitability and readiness of your travel companions.
Measures your preparedness for safety and emergency situations.

categories.name: Fitness
categories.description: Assess your likelihood of achieving various fitness objectives.

criteria.description: Measures how well-defined and realistic your fitness goals are.
Evaluates the regularity of your workout routine.
Measures the alignment of your diet with your fitness goals.
Evaluates how well you manage rest and recovery as part of your fitness regimen.
Assesses the diversity of exercises in your fitness routine.
Measures the extent to which you utilise professional fitness trainers or coaches.
Measures how well-structured and consistent your marathon training plan is.
Evaluates your current stamina and endurance levels.
Assesses your efforts and success in preventing running-related injuries.
Measures how well your diet and hydration habits support marathon training.
Evaluates your mental readiness and resilience for marathon running.
Assesses how well-prepared you are for race day logistics, such as travel and gear.
Measures the effectiveness and consistency of your strength training routine.
Evaluates your daily protein intake relative to your muscle-building goals.
Measures how well you track your muscle-building progress.
Assesses how well you manage rest and recovery periods.
Evaluates the appropriateness and effectiveness of supplements in your diet.
Measures the extent to which you utilise professional fitness trainers or coaches.
